abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of eight organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Shareen Williams and her developmentally delayed sister Raheida Harry meet medical and other expenses.

headline.print_headline: A Caretaker and Protector Dreams of the ‘Fullest’ Life Possible for Her Sister
headline.main: Dreams That a Sister Can Have the ‘Fullest’ Life Possible

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Shareen Williams has cared for her sister, Raheida Harry, who has a chromosomal disorder, for more than a decade, uprooting herself and putting her own needs second....
lead_paragraph: Shareen Williams has cared for her sister, Raheida Harry, who has a chromosomal disorder, for more than a decade, uprooting herself and putting her own needs second.
